country.ukraine.metaDesc: Browse doctors in Ukraine. Filter by clinic, department and city.
country.ukraine.title: Ukraine — Doctors Directory
country.ukraine.subtitle: Information-only catalog. Feofaniya, Shalimov Institute, Heart Institute, National Cancer Institute, Okhmatdyt (Kyiv & Lviv), and Kyiv City Clinical Hospitals. OUTRE for stem cells & PRP.
country.ukraine.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, specialty, or clinic
country.ukraine.sort.name: Name
country.ukraine.empty: No matches. Try changing filters or query.
country.ukraine.emptyHint: Try another city, clinic or specialty.
country.ukraine.usp.expertsDesc: We shortlist department heads and leaders of specialized units.
country.ukraine.usp.safeDesc: Clear coordination, documents in your language, no marketing contracts.
country.ukraine.usp.careDesc: Personal guidance from the first message to your return home.
country.ukraine.pitch.title: Not sure which doctor is right for you?
country.ukraine.pitch.subtitle: Tell me about the diagnosis and preferences. I’ll match you with the right department head, prepare the request, and help you get a quick reply from the clinic.
